TopicTitle: [Showcase] Cleaning out the back of my hangar!

Articles.Content:
Just yesterday I decided to go back to my old .25 save file. (and by 'decided' I mean accidentally clicked on) What I found there was pretty cool. There were plenty of ships that didn't work and were barely half finished. Many of them were something inspired by a craft I saw on the forums, and decided to, quite literally, build on. Many more were things I got frustrated with when they didn't work, and then abandoned them. With all the new stuff in 1.0 and 1.02, I had entirely forgotten about some of my older crafts.

So my question is this. What are some of your best (or worst) unfinished/old crafts?

I don't have pics yet, but I had a base that I wanted to put on Duna. Unfortunately, the thing was so heavy that I had to custom build a giant asparagus stage rocket (I usually build non-asparagus lifters) just to get it into orbital height. Then Mechjeb decided to not to boost at apoapsis and it plummeted through the atmosphere as I distractedly read a book I probably should have turned on the sound. The ineptitude is strong with this one.

Anyway, after that I just forgot about it as it sat in the back of my hanger gathering dust.

Another design I had was from... .23? .24? I don't really know. I tried to build a Lear Jet from the old and heavy Mk3 fuselage. It also had only 2 of the weaker jet engines. Plus I was trying to fly it on essentially 2 or so swept wings.

I really should stop talking. I am just going to make myself sound inept.
